thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 25 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-BAT Says On Track For Another Year Of Earnings Growth

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-BAT Says On Track For Another Year Of Earnings Growth
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - British American Tobacco PLC:
* GROUP REMAINS ON TRACK FOR ANOTHER GOOD YEAR OF EARNINGS GROWTH
* LOOKING FORWARD INTO 2018, FOREIGN CURRENCY EXCHANGE RATES ARE A HEADWIND FOR BUSINESS THIS YEAR
* IF RATES FX WERE TO STAY AT CURRENT LEVELS, CO TO FACE TRANSLATIONAL FOREX HEADWIND OF 7% ON ORGANIC OPERATING PROFIT; 8% ON EPS
* MAINLY DUE TO VOLUME SHIPMENT PHASING, PRICING IN SOME MARKETS, INCLUDING GCC AND RUSSIA, PROFIT GROWTH EXPECTED TO BE SKEWED TO H2
* BY END OF 2018 OBJECTIVE TO MORE THAN DOUBLE REVENUE FROM NEXT GENERATION PRODUCTS TO SUBSTANTIALLY MORE THAN Â£1 BILLION
* TO FURTHER RAISE INVESTMENT PLANS BEHIND NEXT GENERATION PRODUCTS IN 2018; SOME ROLL-OUTS, LAUNCHES PLANNED TOWARDS END OF Q3 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
